open.title: Vuma Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: We are seeing another impact to clients on the Vumatel Villages network in Gauteng, Vumatel engineers are investigating. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Afrihost, Vumatel, and their partners are continuing to monitor. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
We have detected an additional impact and are investigating the outage with Vumatel.
Changes have been made that should stabilise the network significantly, we are continuing to monitor for any disruptions.
Changes have been made that should stabilise the network significantly, we are continuing to monitor for any disruptions.
Afrihost, Vumatel and their partners are still working on resolving the reoccurring connectivity issues.
Afrihost and Vumatel are continuing to monitor. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
The impact has been mitigated and we continue to monitor for any further impacts. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
We detected another impact and are investigating.
We continue to monitor for stability.
Vumatel engineers are continuing to investigate the cause of the outages. We apologize for the issues experienced.
